"T:The Beckoning Woods":
"A large forest has suddenly appeared on
the border between Cuent and Verun.
Harriet has gone into the forest to rescue
people caught up in its emergence!
We've detected a Dark Falz-like reading!
Go and rescue Harriet immediately!
――――――――――――――――――――
Quest condition: HP recovery reduced
Failure: Mission fails, time limit expires,
players are defeated a total of 9 times"
"We'll begin the transfer shortly. The purpose of this mission is to rescue Harriet, who wandered into this forest."
"We have detected energy patterns similar to a Dark Falz, so we expect heavy Darker presence."
"This forest is very eerie and mysterious. There are many vantage points in which enemies may ambush you from, so be careful!"

"Quest Objective [Rescue Harriet!]

Quest fails if there are 9 incapacitations in the entire quest."
